Title: AI Coding Sucks
Description:
AI coding tools suck and are not at all what was promised. I'm done.

00:00 - intro
00:15 - i used to enjoy programming
01:05 - why did I become a programmer
01:55 - AI / LLMs are not predictable
02:47 - models are magic boxes
03:26 - ai programming has become a religion
04:05 - what I've learned and know about working with AI coding tools
04:21 - agents.md / rules
05:38 - make a plan before coding
06:16 - validate the plan
06:49 - use spec driven workflows
07:36 - work on small features not big sweeping changes
07:52 - use AI to write tests / use interactive debugging MCPs
08:17 - AI models are goal seeking
09:11 - use agentic workflows to prevent context bloat
10:13 - how i use AI summary
10:39 - FOMO based development
11:40 - what to do as a new programmer?
12:12 - everything is competing for your attention / money
12:43 - all AI tools are wrappers for foundational models + slight edge
13:15 - use the tools that work
13:40 - what now?
14:24 - what are you going to do?
15:16 - thanks!
